GS25amark2_u:550: (2.5.535) sundarī ramaṇī rāmā kopanā saiva bhāminī

GS25amark2_u:562: (2.5.547) kāntārthinī tu yā yāti saṃketaṃ sābhisārikā

GS25amark2_u:589: (2.5.574) sa tu dvijo 'gredidhiṣūḥ saiva yasya kuṭumbinī
GS25amark2_u:595: (2.5.580) kaulaṭeraḥ kaulateyo bhikṣukī tu satī yadi

GS25amark2_u:601: (2.5.586) nanāndā tu svasā patyurnaptrī pautrī sutātmajā

GS25amark2_u:617: (2.5.602) śvaśrūśvaśurau śvaśurau putrau putraśca duhitā ca
GS25amark2_u:618: (2.5.603) daṃpatī jaṃpatī jāyāpatī bhāryāpatī ca tau

GS25amark2_u:668: (2.5.653) māyuḥ pittaṃ kaphaḥ śleṣmā striyāṃ tu tvagasṛgdharā

GS25amark2_u:700: (2.5.685) uro vatsaṃ ca vakṣaśca pṛṣṭhaṃ tu caramaṃ tanoḥ

GS25amark2_u:709: (2.5.694) madhyamānāmikā cāpi kaniṣṭhā ceti tāḥ kramāt

GS25amark2_u:726: (2.5.711) radanā daśanā dantā radāstālu tu kākudam
GS25amark2_u:731: (2.5.716) dṛgdṛṣṭī cāsru netrāmbu rodanaṃ cāsramaśru ca
GS25amark2_u:733: (2.5.718) karṇaśabdagrahau śrotraṃ śrutiḥ strī śravaṇaṃ śravaḥ
GS25amark2_u:734: (2.5.719) uttamāṅgaṃ śiraḥ śīrṣaṃ mūrdhā nā mastako 'striyām

GS25amark2_u:843: (2.6.826) yaṣṭā ca yajamānaśca sa somavati dīkṣitaḥ
GS25amark2_u:845: (2.6.828) sa gīrpatīṣṭayā sthapatiḥ somapīthī tu somapāḥ
GS25amark2_u:873: (2.6.856) āmikṣā sā śṛtoṣṇe yā kṣīre syāddadhiyogataḥ

GS25amark2_u:883: (2.6.866) triṣvatha kratukarmeṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ khātādi karma yat

GS25amark2_u:924: (2.6.907) ajinaṃ carma kṛttiḥ strī bhaikṣaṃ bhikṣākadambakam
GS25amark2_u:925: (2.6.908) svādhyāyaḥ syājjapaḥ sutyābhiṣavaḥ savanaṃ ca sā

GS25amark2_u:957: (2.7.938) śāsti yaścājñayā rājñaḥ sa samrāḍatha rājakam
GS25amark2_u:974: (2.7.955) vayasyaḥ snigdhaḥ savayā atha mitraṃ sakhā suhṛt
GS25amark2_u:989: (2.7.970) kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ ca vṛddhiśca trivargo nītivedinām
GS25amark2_u:992: (2.7.973) sāhasaṃ tu samo (damo) daṇḍaḥ sāma sāntvamatho samau
GS25amark2_u:1000: (2.7.981) nyāyyaṃ ca triṣu ṣaṭ saṃpradhāraṇā tu samarthanam
GS25amark2_u:1001: (2.7.982) avavādastu nirdeśo nideśaḥ śāsanaṃ ca saḥ
GS25amark2_u:1002: (2.7.983) śiṣṭiścājñā ca saṃsthā tu maryādā dhāraṇā sthitiḥ
GS25amark2_u:1005: (2.7.986) dvipādyo dviguṇo daṇḍo bhāgadheyaḥ karo baliḥ
GS25amark2_u:1008: (2.7.989) yautakādi tu yaddeyaṃ sudāyo haraṇaṃ ca tat
GS25amark2_u:1015: (2.7.996) haimaṃ chatraṃ tvātapatraṃ rājñastu nṛpalakṣma tat
GS25amark2_u:1020: (2.7.1001) mataṅgajo gajo nāgaḥ kuñjaro vāraṇaḥ karī
GS25amark2_u:1024: (2.7.1005) hāstikaṃ gajatā vṛnde kariṇī dhenukā vaśā
GS25amark2_u:1025: (2.7.1006) gaṇḍaḥ kaṭo mado dānaṃ vamathuḥ karaśīkaraḥ
GS25amark2_u:1026: (2.7.1007) kumbhau tu piṇḍau śirasastayormadhye viduḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1035: (2.7.1016) dūṣyā (cūṣā) kakṣyā varatrā syātkalpanā sajjanā same
GS25amark2_u:1037: (2.7.1018) vītaṃ tvasāraṃ hastyaśvaṃ vārī tu gajabandhanī
GS25amark2_u:1043: (2.7.1024) pṛṣṭhyaḥ sthaurī sitaḥ karko rathyo voḍhā rathasya yaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1044: (2.7.1025) bālaḥ kiśoro vāmyaśvā vaḍavā vāḍavaṃ gaṇe
GS25amark2_u:1046: (2.7.1027) kaśyaṃ tu madhyamaśvānāṃ heṣā hreṣā ca nisvanaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1049: (2.7.1030) gatayo 'mūḥ pañca dhārā ghoṇā tu prothamastriyām
GS25amark2_u:1050: (2.7.1031) kavikā tu khalīno 'strī śaphaṃ klībe khuraḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1053: (2.7.1034) yāne cakriṇi yuddhārthe śatāṅgaḥ syandano rathaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1055: (2.7.1036) karṇīrathaḥ pravahaṇaṃ ḍayanaṃ ca samaṃ trayam
GS25amark2_u:1063: (2.7.1044) cakraṃ rathāṅgaṃ tasyānte nemiḥ strī syātpradhiḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1067: (2.7.1048) sarvaṃ syādvāhanaṃ yānaṃ yugyaṃ patraṃ ca dhoraṇam
GS25amark2_u:1070: (2.7.1051) niyantā prājitā yantā sūtaḥ kṣattā ca sārathiḥ
GS25amark2_u:1074: (2.7.1055) senāyāṃ samavetā ye sainyāste sainikāśca te
GS25amark2_u:1079: (2.7.1060) śīrṣaṇyaṃ ca śirastre 'tha tanutraṃ varma daṃśanam
GS25amark2_u:1098: (2.7.1079) tarasvī tvarito vegī prajasvī javano javaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1099: (2.7.1080) jayyo yaḥ śakyate jetuṃ jeyo jetavyamātrake
GS25amark2_u:1100: (2.7.1081) jaitrastu jetā yo gacchatyalaṃ vidviṣataḥ prati
GS25amark2_u:1105: (2.7.1086) śūro vīraśca vikrānto jetā jiṣṇuśca jitvaraḥ
GS25amark2_u:1121: (2.7.1102) lastakastu dhanurmadhyaṃ morvī jyā śiñjinī guṇaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1123: (2.7.1104) lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṃ śaravyaṃ ca śarābhyāsa upāsanam
GS25amark2_u:1132: (2.7.1113) phalako 'strī phalaṃ carma saṃgrāho muṣṭirasya yaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1137: (2.7.1118) vā puṃsi śalyaṃ śaṅkurnā sarvalā tomaro 'striyām
GS25amark2_u:1148: (2.7.1129) reṇurdvayoḥ striyāṃ dhūliḥ pāṃsurnā na dvayo rajaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1154: (2.7.1135) ahamahamikā tu sā syāt parasparaṃ yo bhavatyahaṅkāraḥ
GS25amark2_u:1155: (2.7.1136) draviṇaṃ taraḥ sahobalaśauryāṇi sthāma śuṣmaṃ ca
GS25amark2_u:1157: (2.7.1138) vīrapāṇaṃ tu yatpānaṃ vṛtte bhāvini vā raṇe
GS25amark2_u:1165: (2.7.1146) kṣvedā tu siṃhanādaḥ syāt kariṇāṃ ghaṭanā ghaṭā
GS25amark2_u:1168: (2.7.1149) prasabhaṃ tu balātkāro haṭho 'tha skhalitaṃ chalam
GS25amark2_u:1170: (2.7.1151) mū{chā}ṛ tu kaśmalaṃ moho.āpyavama{da}ṛs tu pīdanam
GS25amark2_u:1184: (2.7.1165) anto nāśo dvayor mṛtyur maraṇaṃ nidhano 'striyām
GS25amark2_u:1186: (2.7.1167) mṛtapramītau triṣvete, citā cityā citiḥ striyām
GS25amark2_u:1194: (2.8.1173) ūravya ūruja aryā vaiśyā bhūmispṛśo viśaḥ |
GS25amark2_u:1197: (2.8.1175) striyāṃ kṛṣiḥ pāśupālyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ ceti vṛttayaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1207: (2.8.1185) yavyaṃ yavakyaṃ yaṣṭikyaṃ yavādibhavanaṃ hi yat
GS25amark2_u:1211: (2.8.1189) bījākṛtaṃ tūprakṛṣṭe sītyaṃ kṛṣṭaṃ ca halyavat
GS25amark2_u:1217: (2.8.1195) kaidārakaṃ syāt kaidā{ya}ṛṃ kṣetraṃ kaidārikaṃ gaṇe
GS25amark2_u:1221: (2.8.1199) nirīṣaṃ kuṭakaṃ phālaḥ kṛṣako lāṃgalaṃ halam
GS25amark2_u:1222: (2.8.1200) godāraṇaṃ ca sīro 'tha śamyā strī yugakīlakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1224: (2.8.1202) puṃsi medhiḥ khale dāru nyastaṃ yat paśubandhane
GS25amark2_u:1226: (2.8.1204) tokmas tu tatra harite kalāyas tu satīnakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1230: (2.8.1208) siddhārthas tveṣa dhavalo godhūmaḥ sumanaḥ samau
GS25amark2_u:1231: (2.8.1209) syād yāvakas tu kulmāṣaś caṇako harimanthakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1232: (2.8.1210) dvau tile tilapejaś ca tilapiñjaś ca niṣphale
GS25amark2_u:1234: (2.8.1212) striyau kaṅgupriyaṅgū dve atasī syādumā kṣumā
GS25amark2_u:1235: (2.8.1213) mātulānī tu bhaṅgāyāṃ vrīhi bhedas tvaṇuḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1237: (2.8.1215) dhānyaṃ vrīhiḥ stambakariḥ stambo gucchas tṛṇādinaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1238: (2.8.1216) nāḍī nālaṃ ca kāṇḍo 'sya palālostrī sa niṣphalaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1239: (2.8.1217) kaḍaṅgaro busaṃ klībe dhānyatvaci tuṣaḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1243: (2.8.1221) śālayaḥ kalamādyāś ca ṣaṣṭikādyāś ca puṃsyamī
GS25amark2_u:1255: (2.8.1233) klībe 'mbarīpaṃ bhrāṣṭro nā kandur vā svedanī striyām
GS25amark2_u:1257: (2.8.1235) piṭharaḥ sthālyukhā kuṇḍaṃ kalaśas tu triṣu dvayoḥ
GS25amark2_u:1260: (2.8.1238) kutūḥ kṛtteḥ snehapātraṃ saivālpā kutupaḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1262: (2.8.1240) da{vi}ṛḥ kambiḥ khajākā ca syāt taddūr dāruhastakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1263: (2.8.1241) astrī śākaṃ haritakaṃ śigrurasya tu nāḍikā
GS25amark2_u:1264: (2.8.1242) kalambaś ca kadambaś ca veṣavāra upaskaraḥ
GS25amark2_u:1265: (2.8.1243) tintiḍīkaṃ ca cukraṃ ca vṛkṣāmlamatha vellajam
GS25amark2_u:1267: (2.8.1245) jīrako jaraṇo 'jāji kaṇāḥ kṛṣṇe tu jīrake
GS25amark2_u:1275: (2.8.1253) tatpatrī kāravī pṛthvī bāṣpikā kabarī pṛthuḥ
GS25amark2_u:1277: (2.8.1255) sāmudraṃ yat tu lavaṇamakṣīvaṃ vaśiraṃ ca tat
GS25amark2_u:1279: (2.8.1257) raumakaṃ vasukaṃ pākyaṃ biḍaṃ ca kṛtake dvayam
GS25amark2_u:1284: (2.8.1262) śūlākṛtaṃ bhaṭitraṃ ca śūlyamukhyaṃ tu paiṭharam
GS25amark2_u:1286: (2.8.1264) syātpicchilaṃ tu vijilaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ śodhitaṃ same
GS25amark2_u:1294: (2.8.1272) yavāgūruṣṇikā śrāṇā vilepī taralā ca sā
GS25amark2_u:1297: (2.8.1275) tattu śuṣkaṃ karīṣo 'strī dugdhaṃ kṣīraṃ payassamam
GS25amark2_u:1304: (2.8.1282) aśanāyā bubhukṣā kṣud grāsastu kavalaḥ pumān
GS25amark2_u:1305: (2.8.1283) sapītiḥ strī tulyapānaṃ sagdhiḥ strī sahabhojanam
GS25amark2_u:1306: (2.8.1284) udanyā tu pipāsā tṛṭ tarpo jagdhistu bhojanam
GS25amark2_u:1307: (2.8.1285) jemanaṃ leha āhāro nighāso nyāda ityapi
GS25amark2_u:1312: (2.8.1290) gomān gomī gokulaṃ tu godhanaṃ syātgavāṃ vraje
GS25amark2_u:1314: (2.8.1292) ukṣā bhadro balīvarda ṛṣabho vṛṣabho vṛṣaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1318: (2.8.1296) utpanna ukṣā jātokṣaḥ sadyo jātastu tarṇakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1321: (2.8.1299) skandhadeśe svasya vahaḥ sāsnā tu galakambalaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1327: (2.8.1305) sa tu sarvadhurīṇaḥ syādyo vai sarvadhurāvahaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1328: (2.8.1306) māheyī saurabheyī gaurusrā mātā ca śṛṅgiṇī
GS25amark2_u:1342: (2.8.1320) na pumsi dāma sandānaṃ paśurajjustu dāmanī
GS25amark2_u:1354: (2.8.1332) vāṇijyaṃ tu vaṇijyā syān mūlyaṃ vasno 'pyavakrayaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1361: (2.8.1339) vipaṇo vikrayaḥ saṃkhyāḥ saṃkhyeye hyādaśa triṣu
GS25amark2_u:1363: (2.8.1341) saṃkhyārthe dvibahutve stas tāsu cānavateḥ striyaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1370: (2.8.1348) ācito daśa bhārāḥ syuḥ śākaṭo bhāra ācitaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1371: (2.8.1349) kārṣāpaṇaḥ kārṣikaḥ syāt kārṣike tāmrike paṇaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1375: (2.8.1353) dravyaṃ vittaṃ svāpateyaṃ rikthamṛkthaṃ dhanaṃ vasu
GS25amark2_u:1378: (2.8.1356) tābhyāṃ yadanyat tatkupyaṃ rūpyaṃ tad dvayamāhatam
GS25amark2_u:1393: (2.8.1371) sarvaṃ ca taijasaṃ lauhaṃ vikārastvayasaḥ kuśī
GS25amark2_u:1394: (2.8.1372) kṣāraḥ kāco 'tha capalo rasaḥ sūtaśca pārade
GS25amark2_u:1410: (2.8.1388) madhu kṣaudraṃ mākṣikādi madhūcchiṣṭaṃ tu sikthakam
GS25amark2_u:1418: (2.8.1396) trikaṭu tryūpaṇaṃ vyopaṃ triphalā tu phalatrikam
GS25amark2_u:1421: (2.8.1397) śūdrāś cāvaravarṇāś ca vṛṣalāś ca jaghanyajāḥ |
GS25amark2_u:1427: (2.8.1402) brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāt sūtas tasyāṃ vaidehako viśaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1428: (2.8.1403) rathakāras tu māhiṣyāt karaṇyāṃ yasya saṃbhavaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1429: (2.8.1404) syāc caṇḍālas tu janito brāhmaṇyāṃ vṛṣalena yaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1430: (2.8.1405) kāruḥ śilpī saṃhatais tair dvayoḥ śreṇiḥ sajātibhiḥ
GS25amark2_u:1431: (2.8.1406) kulakaḥ syāt kulaśreṣṭhī mālākāras tu mālikaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1432: (2.8.1407) kumbhakāraḥ kulālaḥ syāt palagaṇḍas tu lepakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1433: (2.8.1408) tantuvāyaḥ kuvindaḥ syāt tunnavāyas tu saucikaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1438: (2.8.1413) takṣā tu vardhakis tvaṣṭā rathakāraś ca kāṣṭhataṭ
GS25amark2_u:1443: (2.8.1418) syān māyā śāmbarī māyākāras tu pratihārakaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1445: (2.8.1420) bharatā ityapi naṭāś cāraṇās tu kuśīlavāḥ
GS25amark2_u:1447: (2.8.1422) veṇudhmāḥ syur vaiṇavikā vīṇāvādās tu vaiṇikāḥ
GS25amark2_u:1449: (2.8.1424) vaitaṃsikaḥ kauṭikaś ca māṃsikaś ca samaṃ trayam
GS25amark2_u:1452: (2.8.1427) vivarṇaḥ pāmaro nīcaḥ prākṛtaś ca pṛthagjanaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1453: (2.8.1428) nihīno 'pasado jālmaḥ kṣullakaś cetaraś ca saḥ
GS25amark2_u:1458: (2.8.1433) dakṣe tu caturapeśalapaṭavaḥ sūtthāna uṣṇaś ca
GS25amark2_u:1465: (2.8.1439) śunako bhapakaḥ śvā syādalarkas tu sa yogitaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1467: (2.8.1441) viṭcaraḥ sūkaro grāmyo varkaras taruṇaḥ paśuḥ
GS25amark2_u:1472: (2.8.1446) caurikā stainyacaurye ca steyaṃ loptraṃ tu taddhane
GS25amark2_u:1475: (2.8.1449) śulbaṃ varāṭakaṃ strī tu rajjus triṣu vaṭī guṇaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1477: (2.8.1451) puṃsi vemā vāyadaṇḍaḥ sūtrāṇi nari tantavaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1478: (2.8.1452) vāṇir vyūtiḥ striyau tulye pustaṃ lepyādikarmaṇi
GS25amark2_u:1484: (2.8.1458) naddhnī vardhnī varatrā syādaśvādes tāḍanī kaśā
GS25amark2_u:1486: (2.8.1460) nārācī syādeṣaṇikā śāṇas tu nikaṣaḥ kaṣaḥ
GS25amark2_u:1495: (2.8.1469) vācyaliṅgāḥ samas tulyaḥ sadṛkṣaḥ sadṛśaḥ sadṛk
GS25amark2_u:1499: (2.8.1473) bharaṇyaṃ bharaṇaṃ mūlyaṃ nirveśaḥ paṇa ityapi
GS25amark2_u:1506: (2.8.1480) sandhānaṃ syādabhiṣavaḥ kiṇvaṃ puṃsi tu nagnahūḥ
GS25amark2_u:1512: (2.8.1486) paṇo 'kṣeṣu glaho 'kṣās tu devanāḥ pāśakāś ca te
GS25amark2_u:1521: (2.8.1493) sarve ca militvā 750 pra kā mū ślo 281 |
GS25amark2_u:1523: (2.8.1494) evaṃ mū ślo 1017 kṣe ślo 32 sarve mi 1049
